DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 : SEMIFINALS ; SPOTLIGHT ; NO ARGUMENT HERE
DOC.TEXT: Swedish defender Stefan Schwarz won ' t be playing against Brazil today because he received his second yellow card of the game on Sunday , in the 102nd minute , when he fouled Romanian midfielder Ilie Dumitrescu . " Of course everybody wants to play in the semifinal , but I accept the decision , " he said . " I never talk_about the referee ' s decision . I always accept . I left the field quickly and didn ' t complain , so it was no problem for the referee. " LISA DILLMAN
